title: Block转成Chest编译器表示不能直接投射
txt_content:
[20:56:58 ERROR]: null
org.bukkit.command.CommandException: Unhandled exception executing command 'test' in plugin TestPlugin v1.0.0
        at org.bukkit.command.PluginCommand.execute(PluginCommand.java:46) ~[spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at org.bukkit.command.SimpleCommandMap.dispatch(SimpleCommandMap.java:141) ~[spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]

        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.PlayerConnectionUtils$1.run(SourceFile:13) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_241]
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_241]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.SystemUtils.a(SourceFile:46) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.D(MinecraftServer.java:748) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.DedicatedServer.D(DedicatedServer.java:406) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]

        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_241]
Caused by: java.lang.ClassCastException: org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.block.CraftBlock cannot be cast to org.bukkit.block.Chest
        at me.anthony.testproject.TestMain.onCommand(TestMain.java:30) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.command.PluginCommand.execute(PluginCommand.java:44) ~[spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        ... 15 more复制代码以上是报错信息
附上报错代码块
Player p = (Player) sdr;
            Block block = p.getLocation().getBlock();
            p.sendMessage(String.valueOf(block.getType()));
            p.sendMessage(String.valueOf(block.getY()));
            block.setType(Material.CHEST, true);
            Chest chest = (Chest)block;复制代码

replies.author: Dmerican
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

感谢帮助！

replies.author: Dmerican
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

Dmerican 发表于 2020-5-6 22:25
Chest接口是BlockState接口的子接口
谢谢！
凑满10个字

replies.author: William_Shi
replies.txt_content:
首先ClassCastException说是投射，有点奇怪，

应该是类型强制转换异常

其次chest接口表示块状态，


块状态可以理解成是方块的附加信息


比如说告示牌方块的文字，箱子的物品栏等等
